This game is banning people after the purchase the game! Guys don't buy this game, I got VAC banned for no reasone already twice, without any patrol review or anything like that. I never used any software with my CS , and Valve Banned me with Anti-Cheat sh*t for no reason. After i opened my CS, the message said that some of my teammates was using cheats and I got a ban for this, and it happened twice, both times after i purchased the prime status! Don't buy this game, never pay money for it! They are also not responsive with refunds!
